website_summaries.verdict: A well-priced model suitable for low-key gaming and excellent for typical home and office needs.
pros: AMD Ryzen processor gives a solid performance
Allows for multiple gaming devices with eleven USB ports
Can be easily upgraded with more memory and hard drives
cons: Can get hot when running newer games at high settings

customer_reviews.title: Dell has the worst customer service on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Dell has the worst customer service on the planet. Actually they are comparable to worst buy. The computer had a microprocessor problem. They made ME jump through hours and hours of hoops to get the computer replaced. They send me a refurbished piece of junk. Again I have to spend hours and hours on it as their technition. They say there is a home service warranty... Don't believe that for a minute. Everything to Dell is a software problem. Their solution to everything is to reimage the hard drive and reload the operating system. Naturally all your programs have to be reloaded. When they transfer you the call gets dropped. Don't ever buy a Dell computer.
customer_reviews.author: john brandt

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Aesthetically Pleasing BUT! (READ)
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -Fast and snappy response time. -Great lighting and case design. -Very little bloatware or unnecessary programs on first boot CONS: -VERY worried, power supply unit is emitting a BUZZING sound. Occurs whenever unit is plugged in, regardless of computer being on/off. Read about capacitor whine, which if is high-pitched like graphics card squealing, is not the sound I am hearing from this unit. This is not like that whine, this is a persistent low-mid tone electrical buzz sound and I'm fairly concerned. Would be 5/5 if not for this persistent and annoying buzz...
customer_reviews.author: allison strauss

customer_reviews.title: Good low budget gaming computer!
customer_reviews.text: Great computer at a reasonable price. Good low budget gaming computer. Plays every game my son has thrown at it. Large case with blue led lights.
customer_reviews.author: mbar

customer_reviews.title: STILL A GREAT PC
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: after having the pc for over a month the pc is running a bit slow not to where its unusable but to where it is noticeably slow i highly suggest getting an ssd so you can run windows and games alot faster. i also recommend getting an additional fan because it can run a bit hot at times.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Legal Disclaimer is buried and means FALSE ADVERTISING!!  We need to ban this.
customer_reviews.text: The GPU is worth $250 and has been removed! Mine came with a broken GPU, so that caused even more confused. See bottom of summary says (copied and pasted): Legal Disclaimer NOTE: THE GRAPHICS CARD FROM THIS COMPUTER HAS BEEN REMOVED. ALL OTHER PARRS ARE ORIGINAL AND BRAND NEW.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hykes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent PC for the price. May not the be the fastest machine out there, but with 8gb of RAM and dedicated video memory, it is plenty fast enough to play the games I play. If price is a factor, this machine is well worth considering.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Video Production.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer to specifically use PowerDirector software to use in video production. It has worked amazingly well, and when creating HD video in a multiple of format types it creates them very very fast! for samples check out BoilerDan1 on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: DAL

customer_reviews.title: I received this product on March 16th, 2018 through ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on March 16th, 2018 through Trivalley Electronics and More. As of yesterday, June 1st, it is now a paperweight. Completely dead. Their return window is a month after purchase; their product support window ends a month after, at a total of two months. If you're looking for a PC that is entirely dead within three months, this is your winner.
customer_reviews.author: JIM NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Great for office
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money Currently using it with Autodesk Inventor LT with 2d and 3d modeling and work great I will just add an extra 8GB RAM Stick in the future
customer_reviews.author: Cheo

customer_reviews.title: Slow response for a newer computer.
customer_reviews.text: The application start up seems awful slow compared to the 8 year old computer I had before. The internet access also seems a lot slower when opening browser and when downloading data. There was a microcode update and it operates a little faster but it is still slower than the 8 year old computer I had.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kid

customer_reviews.title: best pc for the price
customer_reviews.text: best pc for the price. at a certain angle the blue light shines through and it looks awesome. I couldn't seem to build this pc for less, so this is a great deal. straight out of the box it is already a greatly performing pc, but I am looking into a new graphics card to make this pc even better. this is my first pc, but I would say it performs well for new and experienced people in the pc community.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Moody

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I havent had it for more than a month or so but I play at least 4 hours worth of video games everyday on max settings and spend alot of time watching streams on it and it works amazing (usually leave all my tabs and apps open which would crash my old comp all the time). Great PC for the price and the LED lights are a super neat feature. This is the perfect pc to use when skipping lecture and playing games all day. edit: have been gaming on it practically every day for 2 years now and its still clocking great download/upload speeds and giving me great fps
customer_reviews.author: andrew de los santos

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this PC as a starter gaming PC, and for the price, it delivers a pretty good amount of power. Shipping it to my house was easy, swift, and everything worked right out of the box (after all the Windows 10 updates went through, which took a couple of hours). A few weeks later, after testing several games on it, I must say that I am happy with the purchase, though it can be a bit slow to start up or load games due to there not being a SSD in the system. Overall, I am happy with this system and would recommend it for the money if you are a gamer on a moderate budget.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: It's a great gaming PC for the money, I got it on sale for around $600. Mine overclocked really well, I've got the Ryzen 5 1400 to 3.8 and a Solid overclock on the RX-570 4gb, just remember to set a custom fan curve for an overclock the stock fan curve is too low for the GPU, even if you don't overclock I would still set a custom fan curve for better temps I would also HIGHLY RECOMMEND to get an SSD and swap it for the boot drive, it makes a world of differences trust me. But other than that great computer for the money, if you find it on sale for under $600 buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: This computer has been nothing but a nightmare. This computer has hardware failures and software malfunctions since I bought it 8 months ago. I'm waiting to hear back from the warranty and the insurance I bought for it. Dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: BAWWB

customer_reviews.title: Works mostly at times but will run really warm for unknow reasons
customer_reviews.text: Works great most of the time can run most games at high settings but will run too warm at times and causing stutters which are bad for online play keyboard is great and mouse is great
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Sent with completely wrong parts, no keyboard or cord, and an AMD A10 9700 (not ryzen 5 1400)
customer_reviews.text: Edit It seems as if I have not only been skipped out a power cord, but also been given a lower level RX 560, with only 2gb vram when the description clearly says 4gb. Very upset, nearly impossible to run vr. On top of this I discovered that the processor is an AMD A10 9700, not the promised Ryzen 5 1400. Do not buy, you won't get what you payed for.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Happy ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Customer Experience
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a Dell computer but I have owned quite a few home computers and this one seems to be an incredible value. The AMD Ryzen 5 1400 processor along with the decent Radeon RX 570 graphics card makes this deal pretty good in the $600 range computer .Good job guys on selling a quality product at an incredible price and shipping it on time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg#?

customer_reviews.title: Very good gaming pc solid 300+ FPS on csgo rainbow six ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good gaming pc solid 300+ FPS on csgo rainbow six siege solid 100+ FPS fortnite solid 100+ FPS pubg solid 70+ FPS would highly recommend only thing about it is the fans run very slow would recommend downloading MSI afterburner to up the fan speed
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Horton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade for myself
customer_reviews.text: Awesome upgrade for myself. Upgraded RAM and Hard Drives to SSD but even before that it ran great. Very quiet. Lots of ports. Easily upgraded. Pictures don't show a USB-C port on the front which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: The Rural Overlander

customer_reviews.title: Good computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer was pretty powerful for the price plays all the games I've thrown at it. PubG, OW, and WoW runs great. Mine did not come with Display cord even when the graphics card has Three Display port slots and one HDMI slot
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very fast. We use it for gaming. We needed it for high graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts!!
customer_reviews.text: My son just opened this for Christmas and there was NO KEYBOARD, NO MOUSE, AND WORST OF ALL NO POWER PLUG!!! EVERYTHING IS CLOSED UNTIL THURSDAY AND IM PISSED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rena

customer_reviews.title: You can not feel the performance of this computer without SSD.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the seller, the item and the product. The product came out just as I expected. Dell is always the best. I had a SSD before. I added it to this device. It works great now. The computer start in 9-11 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Mehman Mammadov

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in good time and in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in good time and in good condition. The machine is fast and has not failed me in gaming and normal PC work.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G. Kihara

customer_reviews.title: ... met my sones needs to start gaming and VR good system took little or no time to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and it met my sones needs to start gaming and VR good system took little or no time to set up and start playing/.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Shope

customer_reviews.title: Great pc
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pc for the price very happy with it awesome pc
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer makes a winning noise we decided to go another route
customer_reviews.author: steven garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great starter gaming desktop
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming computer for starters. I edit videos, play rpg and fps games, stream, and do normal online stuff. No issues at all. I run multiple tasks at one time and no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: ... still works well although that dell motherboard bios is like from
customer_reviews.text: It comes with an rx 560 instead of a 570 its kinda of false advertising but still works well although that dell motherboard bios is like from 1996
customer_reviews.author: Italo

customer_reviews.title: This is not a gaming computer.
customer_reviews.text: The is a great computer for everyday use and for cad programs. If you want a gaming computer I would upgrade to a better motherboard and graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: Elohim Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues this PC runs like a dream we'll buy another Dell
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far this computer is running well, Runs most new games on medium-high setting
customer_reviews.author: Moe Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was faster then estimated, works perfecty, runs at impressive speeds, and looks amazing. Definitely a good choice if your looking for a well made relyable gameing pc.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: the PC is great. I strongly suggest getting another 8GB stick of ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the PC is great. I strongly suggest getting another 8GB stick of ram and a SSD and you will be able to get the full potential out of this system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping amazing computer for what I do. Plays Dayz and GTA perfect and boots up pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Layton

customer_reviews.title: faulty
customer_reviews.text: motherboard broke on me after less than a year of use. worked fine up until then. do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Handles everything you throw at it like a champ and leaves lots of room for upgrades down the line. Might benefit from an ssd though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... with parts as high as they are it's a good deal. Works perfectly fine for modern gaming
customer_reviews.text: A little overpriced but with parts as high as they are it's a good deal. Works perfectly fine for modern gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wagley

customer_reviews.title: I'd prefer a different GPU shroud. But it works.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great! I don't like the business look on top. But aside from that the rx 570 paired with the R5 1400 works easily 300-500% better than my old rig. It does video editing seamlessly, which is usually more of a work load than gaming, so if you're interested in gaming this will do. I can't say much else than I would prefer AMD get away from the Blower style graphics cards. They run extremely hot, just not something I would choose if I could avoid it. But it works. Really, really well. So I can't complain. Good job AMD, good job Dell. This one is a winner in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product at a steal of a price! The Ryzen 5 1400 is a really great processor at stock speeds however if your an enthusiast like myself you can overclock it as well I currently have mine at 3.9ghz
customer_reviews.author: Andre Bankey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to work well didnt like the large windows update i had to do owell. pc works good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old son is loving this gaming computer and my college-age daughter is totally jealous.

customer_reviews.title: So far very happy with this computer
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with this computer , works well , fast loading , very quiet , works with my games i play .

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it but it has a little crash on the top case.

customer_reviews.text: It quite running after five days I think dell is a good product some times you get a bad egg 😐 not mad but Disappointed

product_meta.title: Dell i5675-A933BLU-PUS Inspiron 5675 AMD Desktop, Ryzen 5 1400 Processor, 8GB, 1TB, AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB GDDR5 Graphics, Recon Blue
product_meta.description: Designed to change the game. All-new gaming desktop featuring powerful AMD Ryzen processors, graphics ready for VR, LED lighting and a meticulous design for optimal cooling.
feature_bullets: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 Processor (4C/8T, 10MB Cache , 3.4 GHz Precision Boost)
8GB 2400Mz DDR4 up to [32GB] (additional memory sold separately)
1TB 7200 rpm SATA HDD , Tray Loading Dual Layer DVD Burner
